backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining profiles, jobs, applications, messages, and access-controlled CRUD/query functions with ID counters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten mapping of various frontend file paths to concise functional descriptions.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point setting page title to M Employed and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in theme provider and layout components.
frontend/src/components/applications/App: Displays an application status as a styled badge with status‑dependent variant and label.
Dropdown allowing employers to update an application's status with mutation and toast feedback.
Job application form or existing‑application view handling submission, validation, and status display.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication gate prompting users to log in with Internet Identity before accessing protected pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Shows an access restriction message when the user's account type doesn't match the required role, offering navigation and settings options.
frontend/src/components/common/EmptyStat: Displays a centered icon, title, description, and optional action for empty or no‑content states.
frontend/src/components/jobs/JobForm.tsx: Form for creating or editing job postings with fields for details, skills, and publication or deletion actions.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with navigation, authentication handling, responsive menus, and user profile controls.
frontend/src/components/messages/Message: Message input component allowing text entry and sending with Enter support and a send button.
Renders a scrollable list of messages, styling them based on sender identity and showing an empty state when none exist.
frontend/src/components/profile/Candidat: Candidate profile editor for updating location, skills, and bio using profile update hooks.
frontend/src/components/profile/Employer: Employer profile form for editing company name, location, and description with validation and update handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/SkillsIn: Skill entry widget allowing adding, removing, and listing skills via input and badges.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useApplications.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating job applications, including applying, status updates, and retrieving candidate or job-specific applications.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user's profile via the actor with loading state adjustments.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity React context handling login, identity loading, and auth-client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobs.ts: Contains hooks for job CRUD, job search, employer jobs, and related profile queries using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useMemberCount.ts: Fetches total platform member count from the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: Provides hooks to fetch messages for an application and send new messages with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Supports creating and updating user profiles and fetching candidate profiles via React Query and actor methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base theme configuration defining light and dark mode color variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPlatformPage.tsx: Renders the About page describing the platform's mission, features, values, and CTA using UI components.
frontend/src/pages/candidate/CandidateDa: Shows a candidate’s job applications with statuses, loading states, and links to job and message views.
frontend/src/pages/employer/EmployerDash: Displays an employer’s job postings, platform member count, and provides navigation to create new jobs.
frontend/src/pages/employer/JobApplicati: Lists applications for a specific job, showing candidate details, messages, and allowing status changes.
frontend/src/pages/employer/JobEditorPag: Handles creating and editing jobs, including saving, deleting, and toggling publication status with auth checks.
frontend/src/pages/FounderAboutPage.tsx: Renders a founder profile page with photo, biography, vision sections, and a call-to-action card.
frontend/src/pages/JobDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed job information, company profile, and application UI, handling loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/JobsBrowsePage.tsx: Shows a searchable, filterable list of published jobs with loading skeletons and sidebar filters.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Implements the marketing landing page with hero content, feature sections, and logic to route authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesThreadPage.ts: Provides a message thread view for a job application with fetching, refreshing, and sending messages.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Handles new-user onboarding, allowing selection of account type and name before creating an account.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Renders the user profile page, showing profile forms based on account type with loading and auth handling.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Displays account settings and allows switching account type, with identity checks and update logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clean them from hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature states, and rename requests for replacing 'Caffeine Jobs' with 'M Employed'.
